title: MR.SIGA Floor Scrub Brush with Long Handle, 2 in 1 Floor Scrubber and Squeegee for Cleaning Bathroom, Patio, Garage, Wall, Tile Scrub Brush with Stiff Bristles
features: 2 in 1 FLOOR BRUSH & STREAK FREE SQUEEGEE: MR.SIGA floor scrub brush features as a floor scrubber & shower scrub brush as well as a floor squeegee. Firm bristles are not easy to get deformed, broom squeegee can be used safely on hardwood floors, tiles and marbles without risk of scratching and will not leave streaks behind.

HEAVY DUTY & LONG LASTING: This scrub broom is built with durable plastic and sturdy steel pole. Durable PP bristles easily scrub away tough grime and dirt from bathroom, pool, tiles, garage, they are durable enough to stand up after sustained use. Built-in squeegee is made from durable silicone which allows for a fast and convenient cleaning with streak free results and ensures much longer lifespan than rubber blade.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The scrub brush handle and brush head joint is designed with 45 degree angle towrads floor to save your back and knee. Foam wrapped handle top fits comfortably and perfectly in hand, making it easy to apply pressure while scrubbing tough tasks.

ADJUSTABLE LONG 48.8" HANDLE: Comes with 3-section sturdy steel handle with powder-coated finish, you can adjust the pole length and lock to your desired position, so it can accommodates different heights and cleaning tasks. It's absolutely a great household cleaning tool of handling your scrubbing jobs, brings you superior floor cleaning experience.

MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner. If you’re not happy about the product, you’re covered by a full refund. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have, we are here for support and advice!
